Many of our regular readers have noticed this blog pas has been inactive in the last week.<br /><br />We have been on hiatus while we move the entire page to a new server.<br /><br />Starting Thursday, you will once again be able to read fresh entries on cnn.com/hala.<br /><br />The page will continue to include posts on Middle East stories, but will expand to encompass other stories covered in our news programs.<br /><br />Watch this space!<br /><br />Hala
